snippet: Police unions want the courts to decide whether a judge properly ordered changes to the New York Police Department’s stop-and-frisk program.
abstract: New York City police unions have filed papers in appeals court requesting examination of whether a judge properly ordered changes to New York Police Dept's stop-and-frisk program.
lead_paragraph: Police unions want the courts to decide whether a judge properly ordered changes to the New York Police Department’s stop-and-frisk program.

headline.main: Police Fight Orders on Stop and Frisk
headline.print_headline: Police Fight Orders on Stop and Frisk
